warezcdn.name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: Saint Seiya
warezcdn.title: Seinto Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac

imdb.title: Seinto Seiya: Knights of the Zodiac
imdb.plot: A digital remake from the Japanese anime classic Knights of the Zodiac (1986).

episodes.title: The Twelve Houses
episodes.plot: Athena is attacked by a godslayer arrow and Seiya and company must fight against the Gold Knights to save her.

episodes.title: The Seventh Sense
episodes.plot: Seiya faces Aldebaran in the House of Taurus to go ahead and save Athena, but his rival is really powerful.

episodes.title: Andromeda Island
episodes.plot: While Seiya and the others have trouble dealing with Gemini, the action also takes place on Andromeda Island.

episodes.title: Cold Hearted
episodes.plot: Shun confronts the Gemini Gold Knight while Hyoga mysteriously reappears before Camus, his former master.

episodes.title: The land of the dead
episodes.plot: Shiryu goes ahead and arrives at the House of Cancer, where his corresponding Gold Knight is waiting for him ready to kill him.

episodes.title: Rebirth of the Rising Dragon
episodes.plot: Shiryu continues to fight for his life while Seiya approaches the house of Leo, where he thinks he will easily go through but something unexpected surprises him.

episodes.title: Battle for the House of Leo
episodes.plot: Seiya finds Aiolia, but he is acting weird and starts attacking Seiya with the intention to kill him.

episodes.title: The Skull Knights
episodes.plot: After defeating Aiolia, Seiya runs to the next house but before leaving the temple Aiolia warns him about Shaka.

episodes.title: Reflections
episodes.plot: While Seiya and his friends continue their mission, Marin, June and the others also encounter adversities.

episodes.title: The One as Powerful as a God
episodes.plot: Seiya, Shiryu and Shun reach the house of Virgo where Shaka is awaiting. Friend or foe?

episodes.title: Heaven's Treasure
episodes.plot: Shun is having trouble fighting Shaka but Ikki comes to the rescue. This time they have to fight against Shaka's huge divine power.

episodes.title: The Secrets of Sanctuary
episodes.plot: Seiya and his friends reach the house of Scorpio. Finally the secret of the Grand Master is revealed.

episodes.title: Seiya
episodes.plot: After a young, orphan named Seiya, discovers his powers, he is approached by the enigmatic Alman Kido, who urges him to fulfill his destiny, and become a bronze knight.

episodes.title: Kosumo wo moyase
episodes.plot: Burn Your Cosmo: Seiya obtains the Pegasus Armor with ease, but to be a true Knight of Athena, he must first prove himself in the Galaxian Wars tournament.

episodes.title: Doragon tôjô
episodes.plot: Enter the Dragon: Believing in the dark prophecy, Magnus confronts Lady Sienna. Seiya faces his toughest opponents yet: Dragon Long.

episodes.title: Nebyura chên
episodes.plot: Nebula Chain: Reluctant to fight, Andromeda Shaun takes a defensive approach against Unicorn Jab using her Nebula Chain. Meanwhile, Vander's army attacks.

episodes.title: Burakku Seinto
episodes.plot: The Black Knights: Seiya takes down a helicopter to retrieve the stolen Gold Armor from Phoenix Nero, only to be confronted by Vander's Black Knights.

episodes.title: Yomigae Fenikkusu
episodes.plot: Phoenix Rising: Phoenix Nero has built up his overwhelming power with hate. To stop him, the Bronze Knights must combine their strength to reclaim the Gold Armor.

episodes.title: Shirubâ Seinto
episodes.plot: The Silver Knights: Seiya wakes up near the sea, having survived the collapsing volcano by Master Mu, according to Kiki. He quickly discovers that Sanctuary has sent Silver Knight Misty and his old sensi Marin to kill him.

episodes.title: Kiro
episodes.plot: The Rising Tide: Marin fears for Sienna's safety and orders Seiya to guard her. Marin faces Silver Knights Hound Asterion and Whale Morris alone.

episodes.title: Tatakae: Atena no tame ni!
episodes.plot: To Fight For Athena: Seiya is reunited with the other Bronze Knights and they begin to search for Sienna. The Silver Knight Jamian the Crow is determined to stop them.

episodes.title: Chôsen
episodes.plot: After battling the silver knights, a gold knight appear in the way of the heroes. In this decisive step of their journey, the 4 bronze knights and Athena will have to understand the prophecy and face their destiny.

episodes.title: Yogen
episodes.plot: The Prophecy: Guraad sets up his new Black Knights to protect mankind from the gods. His forces abduct Sienna and the Bronze Knights set out to rescue her.

episodes.title: Shûen to hajimari
episodes.plot: One War Ends, Another Begins: The Bronze Knights face-off with Guraad's upgraded Black Knights. Seiya and the others gain the upper hand but Guraad proves to be a formidable enemy.
